title.rendered: Young Conservationists from UNIS Hanoi join Dr. Trang in Exploring Animal Welfare

content.rendered:
? A DAY IN THE LIFE: YOUNG CONSERVATIONISTS FROM UNIS HANOI JOIN DR. TRANG IN EXPLORING ANIMAL WELFARE ?

? What’s it like to walk in the shoes of a conservationist or an animal advocate? Young conservationists from UNIS Hanoi got a firsthand experience with Dr. Trang Nguyen, exploring animal welfare and conservation in action!

? Guided by Dr. Trang Nguyen, students from UNIS Hanoi had the unique opportunity to become a conservationist for a day. Through a hands-on field trip to the zoo, they deepened their understanding of wildlife conservation and animal welfare. Engaging in both individual and group activities, they observed and assessed animal welfare, applying real-world conservation principles under Dr. Trang’s guidance.

? Through the “day in the life of a conservationist” activity, Dr. Trang and WildAct hopes to provide young conservationists with a solid foundation in animal welfare and conservation. More than just a learning opportunity, the trip sought to inspire students to take responsibility for protecting wildlife and to become advocates for change within their communities.
